actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 298.

official_title: A bill to prohibit members and staff of the Federal Reserve System from lobbying for or against legislation, and for other purposes.
short_title: Bring Accountability Now to the Fed Act of 2015
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Bring Accountability Now to the Fed Act of 2015

This bill prohibits members and staff of the Federal Reserve System from lobbying or issuing a pronouncement in support of or against legislation that has been introduced in Congress or in any state or local legislative body.
